title: Stock Futures Fall as Investors Consider the Fed's 2026 Outlook - Europe Market Wrap
description:
Stock Futures Fall as Investors Consider the Fed's 2026 Outlook - Europe Market Wrap 

Stocks fell ahead of the Fed's final interest-rate announcement in 2025, as investors waited to know how authorities perceive monetary policy for the coming year.

title: Oracle Spoils Mood after Fed cut, Causing Stocks to Decline. - Asia Market Wrap
description:
Oracle Spoils Mood after Fed cut, Causing Stocks to Decline. - Asia Market Wrap 

A worldwide markets surge sparked by the Fed's rate cut faded after dismal earnings from Oracle weighed on tech companies, and attention shifted to the US central bank's outlook for additional easing next year.
